message: Let's split fairly, I'll take 60% and you get 40%
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'll offer you 45%, I take 55%. It's still a great deal for you considering the time pressure.
Considering inflation, my previous offer is more reasonable now. Take 42% and let's settle
Alice, time is running out. I'm offering you 48% - take it before inflation eats away at the value even more.
Inflation hurts us both. I'll take 56%, but it's better than risking further loss
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing it all. 49% is my final offer. Don't let greed cloud your judgment.
